data.text: @NicoIate Spam lightning to lower his defense. After that, wail on him with hard-hitting moves like volt bite (Chrono & Ayla dual tech). Have Robo waiting on standby with heal beam, use it AS SOON as Nizbel discharges. Once you got the loop down he's actually very easy.

users.description: He/him. Enjoyer of seinen manga, visual novels, films, TV dramas, and metal music. P+ Falcon & Marth dual main. Lawful good, chuuni, chill af. DMs open.
users.name: Terrace
